name: Hyperhell
description:
HYPERHELL is a maximalist bullet hell roguelike featuring Fraxiom, Gupi and various hyperpop musicians.
Free, with no DLC or microtransactions.

Ronald Reagan has stolen Food House's fully stocked refrigerator, and it's up to them get it back. Travel through colorful cities in hell using a drill powered by demon blood to reach Satan's megamansion and reclaim your grub.

Use popstar powers + a huge arsenal of cartoonish weaponry to carve your way through a wide array of enemies and bosses. Play fast and aggressive using a momentum based movement style to keep up with your appetite.



  • Play as Fraxiom, Gupi, and other hyperpop musicians each with their own popstar powers
  • Dodge and carve through a variety of different enemy bullet types and patterns using a massive arsenal of goofy over-the-top weapons
  • Plunge deeper through the Murder City Megamall, SinCorp LLC Offices, and Satan's Megamansion
  • Outmaneuver your opponents on grind-rails and boost pads with ridiculous movement mechanics
  • Unlock new weapons and powerups for completing challenges, like the Rave Cannon and Trampoline Rifle
  • Looping system allowing high level players to continue runs endlessly
  • Fishing minigame
